plugin.name: AardstatsEpics
plugin.author: TrEz
plugin.purpose: Pull & Display Epics - listday, listday [channel name]

muclient.script:
-- Output channel, defaults to echo channelOutput = "echo"
-- Get epics from API and display them function getEpicsFromApi(channel) local async = require("async")
if channel ~= "" then channelOutput = channel else channelOutput = 'echo' end
async.doAsyncRemoteRequest("https://lightclan.net/api/public/epics-today", handleTodaysEpics , "HTTPS", 5, nil, nil) end
-- Parse response function handleTodaysEpics(retval, page, status, headers, full_status, requested_url, request_body) local json = require("json") local parsedEpics = json.decode(page);
if parsedEpics and #parsedEpics > 0 then for i, v in ipairs(parsedEpics) do Execute(string.format("%s @W%s@w - @x215%s@w by @x153%s@w [note #@W%s@w]", channelOutput, v["startTime"], v["epics"], v["poster"], v["noteId"])) end
else Execute(string.format("%s @x153No remaining epics today@w", channelOutput)) end
end
